entry.title: “The Everlasting Covenant” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q4 2021

media:group.media:title: “The Everlasting Covenant” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q4 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 4, lesson 3 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Present Truth in Deuteronomy” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Everlasting Covenant” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Gen. 12:1–3, Rom. 4:1–5, Exod. 2:24, Deut. 5:1–21, Deut. 26:16–19, Deut. 8:5, Matt. 28:10.
“ ‘And I will establish My covenant between Me and you and your descendants after you in their generations, for an ever- lasting covenant, to be God to you and your descendants after you’ ” (Genesis 17:7, NKJV).
(October 9–October 15)
Sunday (Jill Morikone) - “The Covenant and the Gospel” Monday (John Lomacang) - “The Covenant and Israel” Tuesday (Shelley Quinn) - “The Book of the Covenant” Wednesday (James Rafferty) - “His Special People” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “Other Images”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2021:4Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ421_03.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

entry.title: “Moses’ History Lesson” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 2 Q4 2021

media:group.media:title: “Moses’ History Lesson” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 2 Q4 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 4, lesson 2 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Present Truth in Deuteronomy” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Moses’ History Lesson” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Deuteronomy 1–3, Exod. 32:29–32, Numbers 14, Eph. 3:10, Gen. 15:1–16, John 14:9.
And they “all ate the same spiritual food, and all drank the same spiritual drink. For they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them, and that Rock was Christ” (1 Corinthians 10:3, 4, NKJV).
(October 2–October 8)
Sunday (John Lomacang) - “The Ministry of Moses” Monday (James Rafferty) - “Fulfilled Prophecy” Tuesday (Jill Morikone) - “A Thousand Times More Numerous” Wednesday (Shelley Quinn) - “Kadesh Barnea” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “The Iniquity of the Amorite”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2021:4Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ421_02.pdf

entry.title: “Peace Amidst the Storm” - 3ABN Today Family Worship (TDYFW210030)

media:group.media:title: “Peace Amidst the Storm” - 3ABN Today Family Worship (TDYFW210030)
media:group.media:description:
Men, women, and children are experiencing fear and anxiety as never before. Yet, Jesus said in Matthew 24 stated, “… see that ye be not troubled … all these are the beginning of sorrows.” In this 3ABN Family Worship, we would like to discuss how we may find true peace, comfort, strength, and hope amidst our storms of life. So, join Pastor Kenny & Chris Shelton along with Danny & Yvonne Shelton as they present, “Peace Amidst the Storm.”
TDYFW210030
#PeaceInTheStorm

entry.title: If People Only Knew What Was Coming (What Should You Do?)

media:group.media:title: If People Only Knew What Was Coming (What Should You Do?)
media:group.media:description:
In this sermon produced by 3ABN, Pastor John Lomacang will share from the Bible how we are on the verge of the time of trouble. It can't be stopped. The prophetic signs are all around us and soon God's people will shine His glory and truth to the world. There will only be two sides. Which one will you choose?
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: “Is It Okay to Work on the Sabbath?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210028)

media:group.media:title: “Is It Okay to Work on the Sabbath?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210028)
media:group.media:description:
God's Fourth Commandment says we should refrain from working on Sabbath, but some jobs require it. Are there any exceptions? Find out the answer to this question—and many more—on 3ABN Today Bible Q & A with Greg and Jill Morikone, Ryan Day, and James Rafferty.
Send us your Bible Questions! By email: BibleQA@3abn.org By text: (618) 228-3975
TDYQA210028 #Bibletopics
